articles.description: Fortnite’s new Dragon Ball event lets me feel like I’m actually a Super Saiyan. As Goku, I ran around the Fortnite island, firing Kamehameha beams and flying on the Nimbus Cloud.
articles.content:
Ill never be able to charge up energy like this in real life, but I can in Fortnite.
Image: Epic Games
When we were kids, my friends and I used to play a game we called Be Whoever You Want, where w… [+2635 chars]

articles.title: "Flash" Star Ezra Miller Seeking Treatment - Dark Horizons
articles.description: Actor Ezra Miller has released a statement, via a representative, to Variety in which the troubled “The Flash” film star reveals they are seeking treatment for “complex mental health issues.” The statement follows in the wake of months of troubling behavior, …
